page.title: 07POLLUTION IN WHITTON
page.content: The three commonest types of pollution in our area are noise fumes and litter. The main sources of noise in our area are aircraft, cars aand lorries. The aircraft noise is so bad because we live only three miles from Heathrow Airport which is one of the busiest in the world.Traffic noise is worst near the busy Chertsey Road where there is a constant flow of cars, lorries and other vehicles. Traffic also pollutes the air with harmful but invisible fumes. One form of pollution which is very common is litter. In many roads you find sweet wrappers, tins and bottles even though litter bins are provided. This is more of a problem in Whitton High Street and other main roads than in the quiet residential streets. NELSON SCHOOL
